articles.title: Bruce Lee once told the real Hong Kong story to the world. Now we’re just a prop - South China Morning Post
articles.description: Hollywood films often fail to do our city justice, not like in the days of Bruce Lee, a pioneer in the fight against ‘Asian hate’. We need to start telling our individual Hong Kong story.
articles.content:

articles.title: Singapore's Chin Han on becoming Mortal Kombat's Shang Tsung - CNA
articles.description: Singapore’s only Hollywood blockbuster star talks to CNA Lifestyle about saying yes to an iconic role and being part of an authentically diverse Asian cast.
